text.tspan: Once the Knowledge Base has been created (both starting
from the text or an XML file), it is possible
to load the facts and rules present in the prolog_files
directory; to do so, having the SWI prolog
Launch the command line and change directory to the
Launch the SWI command line, by executing the command
To load the Knowledge Base of the file type “consult(
with the name of the file
To execute the main procedure, type
list of persons and organization will be
If the bg.pl Knowledge Base has been loaded, try
to see the knowledge about bill gates
. The knowledge of the text about
bill gates will be presented; if you want to
repeat the process and show other information about
It is also possible to access knowledge outside the
main loop, an example can be:
In the rules.pl file there are a set of rules which
make it possible to create a list about the
titles of a specific person and list of employees
of an organization. To create the list of titles
To print the list just created type
The list of titles will be
Now try to create the list of titles about william
As you can see the title of “author” is associated
with william henry gates iii but not to bill
gates. if the two entity refer to the same person
through an alias relationship, we can update
and the variable X will be unified with the
alias person i.e william henry gates iii.
If we reprint the list of titles with
has unified the titles lists of bill gates
Note that the entry point of the program can be any
